text: 13:9 Rom 14:17; Efesus 4:14; Kolosi 2:8; 2:16; 1 Timoti 4:3Ia Akar Aghuimɨn mɨn zuir puvatɨzir akar igharaziba ateghtɨ, da ian nɨghnɨzibagh asɨghasɨghtɨ, ia Godɨn gɨn zuir tuavir aghuim ataghɨraghan markɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, e Godɨn apangkuvim amamangatɨghtɨ a gavgavim en navir averiabar anɨngam. Dagheba apir arazim gavgavim en navir averiabar anɨngan kogham. Arazir kam, gumazamizibar darorimɨn akurvazir puvatɨ.
